Photography.title: 摄影
Photography.description: 結苦朱像每訴親只朱叫吃圓得反哭乞兄汁第年, 午邊六吃品聽後條小交, 免誰浪黑神蝶乙高而坐肖圓陽央, 杯好東田明雞買!

alberobello-01.title: 阿尔贝罗贝洛
alberobello-01.description: 結苦朱像每訴親只朱叫吃圓得反哭乞兄汁第年, 午邊六吃品聽後條小交, 免誰浪黑神蝶乙高而坐肖圓陽央, 杯好東田明雞買! 去乙豆: 拍節入合加忍下采戊合那巾抄牙穿奶士的頭對! 林抓蝸己一手空見光行棵.

intro.01: 👋 Hey there! Welcome to my little space for all things web and engineering. 🏡
intro.02: It's a work in progress, but I'm handling everything from content to design and implementation. 💻
intro.03: Curious about what, why, and how I do things? Dive into the threads below and keep reading! 👇

current.01: Right now, I'm focusing on the Photography space, turning it into my personal social media app. 📷
current.02: For the engineering section, I want to keep it simple as a blog. 📝
current.03: But check back later - you might find this chat window turned into a fully functional one!
current.04: 🔍 Why I'm doing all of this?
current.05: I love creating things and doing them myself, especially if it can bring value to others. 🌟
current.06: I'm fascinated by how different cultures approach technology, so stay tuned for more on that! 🌍

background.01: I studied Media Informatics - a computer science major focused on project work. 🎓
background.02: We did everything from requirements gathering to prototyping, designing, development, research, and analysis.
background.03: It was demanding, but I loved learning how to do it all.
background.04: My focus areas were multimedia, human-computer interaction, and engineering.
background.05: I particularly enjoy creating eye-catching, highly interactive and engaging user experiences that are fun to use.
background.06: For my thesis, I developed a game using eye-tracking and gesture controls. 🎮
background.07: That was almost ten years ago, and now we have tech like Meta Quest and Apple Vision Pro!

professional.01: I've been a professional web software engineer since 2017. 💼
professional.02: I've gained experience developing high-performing, scalable solutions and most importantly, solutions that were easy to work with for me peers.
professional.03: The best times at work are when I'm involved in everything to implement impactful solutions.
professional.04: I've had great relationships with mentors and superiors, always picking their brains non-stop. 🧠
professional.05: I've delved into every step needed to deploy features, microservices, and apps from small to international scale.
professional.06: From implementation, testing, automation, and QA to monitoring and analytics. 🔄
professional.07: I've focused a lot on Frontend, Web Performance, tooling, SEO, CMS, and A/B testing.
professional.08: I'm also very interested in diving deeper into real-time systems, payments, AI, and user-related topics. All vital for creating more impactful and user-centric solutions. 🤖

tools.01: These days, most of my work is with JavaScript/TypeScript and NodeJS. 🛠️
tools.02: I primarily use frameworks like React and NextJS to build dynamic, high-performance web applications.

outro.01: Alright, that's it for now! Hope this gives you a good overview.
outro.02: If you have exciting opportunities or challenges that resonate with my skill set and interests I'd love to hear from you. 📬
